results.title: You don't know why you came here
results.creator_credit: Dick Marks, Millie Williams and Martin Williams Films
results.brief_description: Trisha returns home to Queensland after years abroad. She travels through the state while a musical soundtrack provides a background to the scenery. No spoken commentary. Music by Terry Hannigan.
results.title_for_label: You don’t know why you came here
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dick Marks, Millie Williams and Martin Williams Films

results.title: You and hydatids
results.creator_credit: Norman Laird and Tasmanian State Film Unit
results.brief_description: Warns against the danger of humans contracting hydatids through the careless handling of sheep and dog. Explains how, by eating offal from infected animals, the dog becomes the carrier of the disease between sheep and man. The disease my be prevented from spreading by boiling sheep offal prior to feeding to dogs, by carefully washing all vegetables to be eating raw by keeping the dog outside the home and car and by giving the dog regular medical examinations.

results.title: Yoshi no yama: a classical Japanese dance
results.brief_description: A single dancer, by the use of masks, tells the story of three friends of different temperaments. A preface shows the application of kabuki make-up; the dance itself, a buyo dance with the stylization and refinement of the no tradition, is performed with the choreographic use of the on-stage-hand, or figure in black.

results.title: World's toughest car trial
results.brief_description:
A film record of the 1953 Redex Car Trial. The film begins with the scrutineering of the cars in Sydney, their start on the official route,
following them through many of the controls and finally concluding with their return to Sydney and the presentation of prizes to winners.

results.title: Working with a computer: step by step
results.creator_credit: John Dutot, Pat Dowling and BBC-TV
results.brief_description: The first part of an introductory course on practical use of electronic data processing, discussing the main elements of the operation and parts of a computer. Its high speed and flexibility make it a tool of immense power.

results.title: The Working of magnesium
results.brief_description: Portrays the correct technique for machining, forming arc and spot welding, riveting, chemical treating and painting of magnesium alloys.

results.title: Working and playing to health
results.brief_description: Shows the programs of recreational, occupational and industrial therapy for the patients of a mental hospital. Explains why and how these techniques are used to bring patients back to health.

results.title: Work study case histories. No. 1
results.brief_description: An analysis of press cropping of mild steel bars is designed to help work study lecturers; each operation requiring special work skills and techniques. The first part is a complete record of the original method filmed as it would be see by a work study engineer. The film would then be stopped for students to carry out their studies before seeing the improved methods actually installed by the firms.

results.title: Wool Fashion Awards of 1960
results.brief_description: Every year, a fashion contest to promote wool as a fabric is held by the Australian Wool Bureau. In 1960, Melbourne compered the awards and this film shows many of the winning entries in the fifty-five sections. Those modelled include suits, coats, dresses, knitwear and slacks. The supreme award for 1960 is the climax of the parade of gold medal winners, held at the end of four days judging.
